permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery

Class DeliveryQueueProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueueProcessor

  • public class DeliveryQueueProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Processes jobs on a TN delivery queue via a bizdoc processing service.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String DELIVER_BATCH_SERVICE_NAME
      The name of the service that Trading Networks uses to invoke delivery queue processing services.
      private static boolean isStarted
      Whether queue processing is started.
      private static long MIN_WAIT_BETWEEN_DELIVERY_QUEUE_POLLS_MILLISECONDS
      The minimum wait between each poll of a delivery queue for more jobs.
      private static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Thread> queueProcessingThreads
      List of the threads currently processing queues, to prevent multiple processes per queue.
      private static java.lang.String SUPERVISOR_THREAD_SUFFIX
      The suffix used on supervisor thread names.
      private static long WAIT_AFTER_EMPTY_DELIVERY_QUEUE_POLL_MILLISECONDS
      The wait after a poll of an empty delivery queue until we poll again for more jobs.
      private static long WAIT_BETWEEN_DELIVERY_QUEUE_REFRESH_MILLISECONDS
      The wait between each refresh of a delivery queue settings from the database.
      private static java.lang.String WORKER_THREAD_SUFFIX
      The suffix used on worker thread names.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void each(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue, com.wm.lang.ns.NSName service, com.wm.data.IData pipeline, javax.xml.datatype.Duration age, int concurrency, int retryLimit, float retryFactor, javax.xml.datatype.Duration timeToWait, int threadPriority, boolean daemonize, boolean ordered, boolean suspend, java.lang.String exhaustedStatus)
      Dequeues each task on the given Trading Networks delivery queue, and processes the task using the given service and input pipeline; if concurrency greater than 1, tasks will be processed by a thread pool whose size is equal to the desired concurrency, otherwise they will be processed on the current thread.

      Dequeues each task on the given Trading Networks delivery queue, and processes the task using the given service and input pipeline; if concurrency greater than 1, tasks will be processed by a thread pool whose size is equal to the desired concurrency, otherwise they will be processed on the current thread.

      • each

        public static void each(java.lang.String queueName,
                        java.lang.String service,
                        com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                        javax.xml.datatype.Duration age,
                        int concurrency,
                        int retryLimit,
                        float retryFactor,
                        javax.xml.datatype.Duration timeToWait,
                        int threadPriority,
                        boolean daemonize,
                        boolean ordered,
                        boolean suspend,
                        java.lang.String exhaustedStatus)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.sql.SQLException,
                        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Dequeues each task on the given Trading Networks delivery queue, and processes the task using the given service and input pipeline; if concurrency greater than 1, tasks will be processed by a thread pool whose size is equal to the desired concurrency, otherwise they will be processed on the current thread.
        Parameters:
        queueName - The name of the delivery queue whose queued jobs are to be processed.
        service - The service to be invoked to process jobs on the given delivery queue.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the given service.
        age - The minimum age a task must be before it is processed.
        concurrency - If greater than 1, this is the number of threads used to process jobs simultaneously.
        retryLimit - The number of retries this job should attempt.
        retryFactor - The factor used to extend the time to wait on each retry.
        timeToWait - The time to wait between each retry.
        threadPriority - The thread priority used when processing tasks.
        daemonize - If true, all threads will be marked as daemons and execution will not end until the JVM shuts down or the TN queue is disabled/suspended.
        ordered - Whether delivery queue jobs should be processed in job creation datetime order.
        suspend - Whether to suspend the delivery queue on job retry exhaustion.
        exhaustedStatus - The user status set on the bizdoc when all retries are exhausted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error is encountered.
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error is encountered.
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error is encountered while processing jobs.

      • each

        public static void each(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue,
                        com.wm.lang.ns.NSName service,
                        com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                        javax.xml.datatype.Duration age,
                        int concurrency,
                        int retryLimit,
                        float retryFactor,
                        javax.xml.datatype.Duration timeToWait,
                        int threadPriority,
                        boolean daemonize,
                        boolean ordered,
                        boolean suspend,
                        java.lang.String exhaustedStatus)
                 throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException,
                        java.sql.SQLException
        Dequeues each task on the given Trading Networks delivery queue, and processes the task using the given service and input pipeline; if concurrency greater than 1, tasks will be processed by a thread pool whose size is equal to the desired concurrency, otherwise they will be processed on the current thread.
        Parameters:
        queue - The delivery queue whose queued jobs are to be processed.
        service - The service to be invoked to process jobs on the given delivery queue.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the given service.
        age - The minimum age a task must be before it is processed.
        concurrency - If greater than 1, this is the number of threads used to process jobs simultaneously.
        retryLimit - The number of retries this job should attempt.
        retryFactor - The factor used to extend the time to wait on each retry.
        timeToWait - The time to wait between each retry.
        threadPriority - The thread priority used when processing tasks.
        daemonize - If true, all threads will be marked as daemons and execution will not end until the JVM shuts down or the TN queue is disabled/suspended.
        ordered - Whether delivery queue jobs should be processed in job creation datetime order.
        suspend - Whether to suspend the delivery queue on job retry exhaustion.
        exhaustedStatus - The user status set on the bizdoc when all retries are exhausted.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error is encountered while processing jobs.
        java.sql.SQLException - If an error is encountered with the database.

      • getExecutor

        private static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getExecutor(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue,
                                                                int concurrency,
                                                                int threadPriority,
                                                                boolean threadDaemon,
                                                                com.wm.app.b2b.server.InvokeState invokeState,
                                                                java.lang.String parentContext)
        Returns an executor appropriate for the level of desired concurrency.
        Parameters:
        queue - The delivery queue to be processed.
        concurrency - The level of desired concurrency.
        threadPriority - The thread priority to be used by the returned executor.
        threadDaemon - Whether the created threads should be daemons.
        invokeState - The invoke state to be used by the thread pool.
        parentContext - A unique parent context ID to be included in a thread name for diagnostics.
        Returns:
        An executor appropriate for the level of desired concurrency.

      • getThreadPrefix

        private static java.lang.String getThreadPrefix(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue,
                                                java.lang.String parentContext)
        Returns the thread name prefix to be used for this delivery queue.
        Parameters:
        queue - The queue which will be processed by threads with the returned prefix.
        parentContext - A unique parent context ID to be included in a thread name for diagnostics.
        Returns:
        The thread name prefix used when processing the qiven queue.

      • invokedByTradingNetworks

        private static boolean invokedByTradingNetworks()
        Returns true if the invocation call stack includes the WmTN/wm.tn.queuing:deliverBatch service.
        Returns:
        True if the invocation call stack includes the WmTN/wm.tn.queuing:deliverBatch service.

      • untilNextRun

        private static long untilNextRun(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue)
                          throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the number of milliseconds to wait until the next scheduled run of the given delivery queue.
        Parameters:
        queue - A delivery queue.
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds to wait.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a datetime parsing error occurs.
